wanderer_elara.name: Elara Meadowlight
wanderer_elara.motivation: To decode the starfall's forgotten warnings hidden in the celestial tomes and prevent the realm's collapse.

scribe_korbin.name: Korbin Stonehand
scribe_korbin.motivation: To interpret the prophetic warnings of the celestial convergence etched in starlight and avert cosmic calamity.

current_scene.description: A colossal mechanism hums beneath the tomes, its gears forged from starlight. The walls pulse with ancient glyphs that align as Elara and Korbin decipher their meanings.

knowledge_base.story_rules: Generate a continuously evolving and engaging narrative without a predefined end. Focus on emergent events, character development through ongoing experiences, and dynamic world changes.

continuous_story_generation_001.task_description: Generate the next segment of the endless story.

evaluate_current_state.description: Assess current character states, location, and recent events.

select_event_prompt.description: Choose or generate an appropriate event prompt to drive the story forward.

develop_narrative_segment.description: Flesh out the event, character reactions, and immediate consequences.

update_world_and_characters.description: Update the story state based on the newly generated segment.

todo.continuous_story_generation_005: The tomes' fractured translations converge on a single glyph, triggering a dormant mechanism in the library floor.
